name: Ultimate Battles
description:
Fight to the finish on the Bucks home court!

PLAYERS

2 Players (Mandatory)

OBJECTIVE

Defeat the other player by landing attacks and avoiding their attacks.

CONTROLS - KEYBOARD

Player 1 Move          Left, Right
Player 1 Jump          Up, Down
Player 1 Attack       Right Alt

Player 2 Move          A, D
Player 2 Jump          W, S
Player 2 Attack       Left Ctrl
